title: Median Salary of Women in Najaf Per Year
summary: This chart shows the Median Salary for Women in Najaf Per Year Per Year .
\\n In 2000 , £ 22.5 ,000 was the Median Salary , which increased by 2005 to just under £ 25.65 ,000 .
This had dropped by 2010 however , at £ 19.75 ,000 - and dropped again in 2015 .
gold: The bar chart shows the median salary of women in Najar per year over a 4 year period . In 2000 the median salary was approximately £ 22.5 k . In 2005 the median salary was just under £ 26 k .
